file_content.text: Lost souls still wander the Nightmare Lands, but not for Lord Renik. Thank you.
Master Kelthan. Lord Renik is dead. He was guarding these tablets.
These tablets must contain the source of Lord Renik's power. The lost are no longer under his control.
Perhaps something here can help restore them fully. I will study these in greater detail. Thank you.
We must locate the source of Lord Renik's power before others fall under his sway.
Have you felt it, young Jedi? That tremor? The knowledge that something is wrong?
A moment, if you please. Whatever your business, you have time for a warning.
Madness is not the only danger in the Nightmare Lands. There are those who have learned to wield the darkness here.
They will prey on your confusion and bend you to their will. Their power cannot be explained, but must be stopped.
I completed the ritual of cleansing.
I'm perfectly safe out here.
Any way I can avoid going crazy?
How can I protect myself?
The Mystics' ritual will protect you from madness. What of those already lost?
I need more information.
Talk about confused....
I may be old, but my eyes still work. What I've seen here could threaten us all.
A Sith named Lord Renik has found a way to control the lost souls wandering the Nightmare Lands. Voss and Gormak alike.
I don't know his methods, or how he avoided madness himself. But he controls a small army now. It must end.
Without joining his army.
How much control does Lord Renik have?
How far does this power go?
Enough to matter. The lost follow Lord Renik. They defend him, even against their own.
The Voss wouldn't like this if they knew.
We don't have to fight alone.
I've appealed to the Voss many times. They believe Lord Renik to be as mad as his men.
Has Lord Renik targeted anyone specifically?
What's Lord Renik planning?
Not yet. But once he has the number he desires, I doubt he will turn them on the Empire.
An army of loons won't get him very far.
Lord Renik's wasting his time.
The lost are Voss commandos, Gormak warriors. They could kill if Lord Renik orders it.
You're a Jedi. Go end it.
I was young like you once. But I no longer have the strength to resist the darkness.
Were I to venture out and confront Lord Renik, I would only become another of his slaves. You are stronger than that.
You must find Lord Renik and discover the source of his power. If not for me, then for the lost souls that serve him.
I'll do my best to help.
Me to the rescue again.
Let us hope your pride does not become your weakness.
The coordinates where Lord Renik was last seen. Be sure you are prepared to face him.
Too dangerous. [Refuse quest]
We cannot allow fear to prevent us from doing our duty.
Tread carefully here, young one. The Nightmare Lands are aptly named.
